table.name: vtiger_serviceengineer
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_serviceengineer` ( `serviceengineerid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `service_engineer_name` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, `date_of_birth` date DEFAULT NULL, `date_of_joining` date DEFAULT NULL, `user_password` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `confirm_password` text DEFAULT NULL, `email` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `phone` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, `office` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `sub_service_manager_role` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `cust_role` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `designaion` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `regional_office` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `district_office` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `activity_centre` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `service_centre` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `production_division` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `business_vertical` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `yoe` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT NULL, `approval_status` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `sys_detect_role` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `yoe_inequi_aggre` decimal(3,2) DEFAULT NULL, `badge_no` varchar(11) DEFAULT NULL, `rejection_reason` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `ser_usr_log_plat` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `ticket_assign` int(1) DEFAULT 0, `on_leave` int(1) DEFAULT 0, `eq_sr_equip_model` text DEFAULT NULL, `masn_aggrregate` text DEFAULT NULL, `auto_asgn_ticket` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `usr_verification` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_serviceengineercf
